data.title: Northeastern University in Silicon Valley
data.meta_description: Computer science, engineering, and professional masters programs to help you reach new levels of leadership, or change careers entirely.

Northeastern in Silicon Valley

News and Events

Plan Your Visit

"The resources are there, and your path is individual. I feel empowered. My mindset has shifted. Before when learning something new, I used to think, 'it's going to be so difficult.' Now I feel like I can learn anything."

—Priyanka Chandak, MPS in Analytics

"This experience of getting my MS in Computer Science has been the most challenging, exhilarating, and rewarding experience I have encountered so far."

—Semaa Amin, MS in Computer Science, Align

"In order to be competitive, you need to have practical knowledge and theoretical knowledge. Northeastern is really good at providing that."

—Bilal Khan, MS in Computer Science

Previous

Next

Featured Programs

Align Master of Science in Computer Science

Northeastern University’s Align Master’s in Computer Science program provides a direct path to an MS in Computer Science and a high-demand, rewarding career—for noncomputer science degree holders with no previous programming experience.

Learn more

Bridge Master of Science in Information Systems

Build a career at the intersection of business, IT management, and engineering. We offer a standard track for students with programming or engineering experience, and a Bridge track for those new to the field.

Learn more

Master of Professional Studies in Analytics

Gain a deep understanding of the mechanics of working with data—collecting, modeling, structuring, and ultimately communicating.

Learn more

Align Master of Science in Data Science

Learn to collect, analyze and comprehend data, and how to use it to solve some of the world’s most complex organizational problems.

Learn more

Computer Science — Align
